name: Downstairs (Ti-Noir)
description:
Your parents always told you to never go down into their basement...

You're home alone tonight so you'll find out why...

Famicase Art By Elliot Gray

Game By Ti-Noir

This is a retro-style horror game made in about a week for the A Game By Its Cover 2021 Game Jam. If for some reason you put a gameplay video of this on Youtube make sure you send it to me. And leave a rating.

My Gameplay of it:

Warning: The game is extremely buggy, I'll try my best to fix it but it probably won't be perfect before the jam's deadline is reached.
